nodes.text: I have to say no to war.
there is no guarantee that this military adventure will in fact lead to a  regime change  or peace and stability for your region

I am unconvinced along with so many others in the world that your dictator has sufficient weapons of mass destruction truly to pose a threat to other countries or ties to criminal groups who could use them for terror
The war may not change regime or lead to peace and stability

In the balance are not only the dead and mutilated of Iraq (and who knows how many from the invading force) but the very real possibility that such an act of pre-emptive world-destabilising aggression could spin out of control and lead to other despots pre-emptively arming themselves with all manner of apocalyptic weapons and perhaps to Armageddon.
There is no need of this war
Our goal is to avoid people dying
best means to do it is to stop or not combat  wars we do not need
Iraq might not be a threat
If Iraq is threat the best means to secure our saferty is a war
